attributes.action: Provide a new ethnicity classification for Andrew Hignett.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Andrew Hignett has recently visited a tanning salon and is now oranger than David Dickinson AND the Tango man put together. For the purposes of fair and proportionate ethnicity counting, we ask that he be given his own Ethnicity code

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
